name: Ext_R3_ImagingStudy_se_performer
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ImagingStudy.series.performer for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImagingStudy.series.performer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The physician or operator (often the radiology technician)  who performed the series. The performer is recorded at the series level, since each series in a study may be performed by a different practitioner, at different times, and using different devices. A series may be performed by multiple practitioners.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.series.performer` maps to R4 `ImagingStudy.series.performer`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
